resources.string: Are you sure you want to finish the game?
Are you sure you want to leave the stage?
Go back to Select stage screen
Finish game and start a new one?
Error connecting to server, check your data connection
Do you want to close Tetro puzzle?
Stage 2: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 5, missing bricks per row: 1
Stage 4: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 10, missing bricks per row: 1
Stage 6: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 5, missing bricks per row: 2
Stage 10: hold for 3 minutes starting at speed 9
Stage 11: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 10, missing bricks per row: 2
Stage 13: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 5, missing bricks per row: 3
Stage 14: hold for 5 minutes starting at speed 8
Stage 16: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 10, missing bricks per row: 3
Stage 18: hang on for 10 minutes starting at speed 5
Stage 19: for every 1 lines or more you complete, you increase the speed by 1, reach speed 13
Stage 20: complete 4 lines with a single chip in 4 opportunities
Stage 21: hang on for 5 minutes starting at speed 6
Stage 23: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 5, missing bricks per row: 4
Stage 24: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 10, missing bricks per row: 4
Stage 26: the Left and Right arrows work in reverse, complete 50 lines
Stage 27: for every 3 lines completed, speed will grow up by 1, reach speed 11
Stage 28: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 5, missing bricks per row: 5
Stage 30: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 5, missing bricks per row: 6
Stage 32: complete 4 lines with a single chip in 10 opportunities
Stage 34: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 10, missing bricks per row: 5
Stage 35: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 5, missing bricks per row: 7
Stage 38: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 10, missing bricks per row: 6
Stage 40: for every 5 lines or more you complete, you increase the speed by 1, reach speed 10
Stage 41: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 10, missing bricks per row: 7
Stage 44: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 5, missing bricks per row: 8
Stage 47: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 10, missing bricks per row: 8
Stage 48: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 5, missing bricks per row: 9
Stage 50: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 10, missing bricks per row: 9
Stage 52: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 15, missing bricks per row: 1
Stage 53: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 15, missing bricks per row: 2
Stage 54: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 15, missing bricks per row: 3
Stage 56: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 15, missing bricks per row: 4
Stage 57: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 15, missing bricks per row: 5
Stage 58: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 15, missing bricks per row: 6
Stage 60: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 15, missing bricks per row: 7
Stage 61: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 15, missing bricks per row: 8
Stage 62: remove all gray bricks. Rows: 15, missing bricks per row: 9
Internal error, log out and try again later
Continue whitout log in with Facebook
Log in with Facebook error, you can try again

- It will allow you to automatically save the score obtained in Classic and Challenge modes in a common table to Tetro puzzle players from around the world. This table can be seen from the button Top Players.
- It will prevent you from losing Campaign mode advances, even if you uninstall and reinstall Tetro puzzle.
Your progress will be lost if you uninstall Tetro puzzle, continue without logging in with Facebook?
